class.name: OpenXRAPIExtension
class.brief_description: Makes the OpenXR API available for GDExtension.
class.description: [OpenXRAPIExtension] makes OpenXR available for GDExtension. It provides the OpenXR API to GDExtension through the [method get_instance_proc_addr] method, and the OpenXR instance through [method get_instance]. It also provides methods for querying the status of OpenXR initialization, and helper methods for ease of use of the API with GDExtension.

method.name: action_get_handle
method.description: Returns the corresponding [code]XrAction[/code] OpenXR handle for the given action RID.

method.name: begin_debug_label_region
method.description: Begins a new debug label region, this label will be reported in debug messages for any calls following this until [method end_debug_label_region] is called. Debug labels can be stacked.

method.name: can_render
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if OpenXR is initialized for rendering with an XR viewport.

method.name: end_debug_label_region
method.description: Marks the end of a debug label region. Removes the latest debug label region added by calling [method begin_debug_label_region].

method.name: find_action
method.description: Returns the [RID] corresponding to an [code]Action[/code] of a matching name, optionally limited to a specified action set.

method.name: get_error_string
method.description: Returns an error string for the given [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html]XrResult[/url].

method.name: get_hand_tracker
method.description: Returns the corresponding [code]XRHandTrackerEXT[/code] handle for the given hand index value.

method.name: get_instance
method.description: Returns the [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrInstance.html]XrInstance[/url] created during the initialization of the OpenXR API.

method.name: get_instance_proc_addr
method.description: Returns the function pointer of the OpenXR function with the specified name, cast to an integer. If the function with the given name does not exist, the method returns [code]0[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] [code]openxr/util.h[/code] contains utility macros for acquiring OpenXR functions, e.g. [code]GDEXTENSION_INIT_XR_FUNC_V(xrCreateAction)[/code].

method.name: get_next_frame_time
method.description: Returns the predicted display timing for the next frame.

method.name: get_openxr_version
method.description: Returns the version of OpenXR that was initialized. Only valid after the OpenXR instance has been created. See [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.1/html/xrspec.html#XR_MAKE_VERSION]XR_MAKE_VERSION[/url] for how the version is calculated.

method.name: get_play_space
method.description: Returns the play space, which is an [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSpace.html]XrSpace[/url] cast to an integer.

method.name: get_predicted_display_time
method.description: Returns the predicted display timing for the current frame.

method.name: get_projection_layer
method.description: Returns a pointer to the render state's [code]XrCompositionLayerProjection[/code] struct. [b]Note:[/b] This method should only be called from the rendering thread.

method.name: get_render_state_z_far
method.description: Returns the far boundary value of the camera frustum. [b]Note:[/b] This is only accessible in the render thread.

method.name: get_render_state_z_near
method.description: Returns the near boundary value of the camera frustum. [b]Note:[/b] This is only accessible in the render thread.

method.name: get_session
method.description: Returns the OpenXR session, which is an [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSession.html]XrSession[/url] cast to an integer.

method.name: get_supported_swapchain_formats
method.description: Returns an array of supported swapchain formats.

method.name: get_swapchain_format_name
method.description: Returns the name of the specified swapchain format.

method.name: get_system_id
method.description: Returns the ID of the system, which is an [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSystemId.html]XrSystemId[/url] cast to an integer.

method.name: insert_debug_label
method.description: Inserts a debug label, this label is reported in any debug message resulting from the OpenXR calls that follows, until any of [method begin_debug_label_region], [method end_debug_label_region], or [method insert_debug_label] is called.

method.name: is_environment_blend_mode_alpha_supported
method.description: Returns [enum OpenXRAPIExtension.OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport] denoting if [constant XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND] is really supported, emulated or not supported at all.

method.name: is_initialized
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if OpenXR is initialized.

method.name: is_running
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if OpenXR is running ([url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/xrBeginSession.html]xrBeginSession[/url] was successfully called and the swapchains were created).

method.name: openxr_is_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if OpenXR is enabled.

method.name: openxr_swapchain_acquire
method.description: Acquires the image of the provided swapchain.

method.name: openxr_swapchain_create
method.description: Returns a pointer to a new swapchain created using the provided parameters.

method.name: openxr_swapchain_free
method.description: Destroys the provided swapchain and frees it from memory.

method.name: openxr_swapchain_get_image
method.description: Returns the RID of the provided swapchain's image.

method.name: openxr_swapchain_get_swapchain
method.description: Returns the [code]XrSwapchain[/code] handle of the provided swapchain.

method.name: openxr_swapchain_release
method.description: Releases the image of the provided swapchain.

method.name: register_composition_layer_provider
method.description: Registers the given extension as a composition layer provider. [b]Note:[/b] This cannot be called after the OpenXR session has started. However, it can be called in [method OpenXRExtensionWrapper._on_session_created].

method.name: register_frame_info_extension
method.description: Registers the given extension as modifying frame info via the [method OpenXRExtensionWrapper._set_frame_wait_info_and_get_next_pointer], [method OpenXRExtensionWrapper._set_view_locate_info_and_get_next_pointer], or [method OpenXRExtensionWrapper._set_frame_end_info_and_get_next_pointer] virtual methods. [b]Note:[/b] This cannot be called after the OpenXR session has started. However, it can be called in [method OpenXRExtensionWrapper._on_session_created].

method.name: register_projection_views_extension
method.description: Registers the given extension as a provider of additional data structures to projections views. [b]Note:[/b] This cannot be called after the OpenXR session has started. However, it can be called in [method OpenXRExtensionWrapper._on_session_created].

method.name: set_custom_play_space
method.description: Sets the reference space used by OpenXR to the given [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSpace.html]XrSpace[/url] (cast to a [code]void *[/code]).

method.name: set_emulate_environment_blend_mode_alpha_blend
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code], an OpenXR extension is loaded which is capable of emulating the [constant XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND] blend mode.

method.name: set_object_name
method.description: Set the object name of an OpenXR object, used for debug output. [param object_type] must be a valid OpenXR [code]XrObjectType[/code] enum and [param object_handle] must be a valid OpenXR object handle.

method.name: set_render_region
method.description: Sets the render region to [param render_region], overriding the normal render target's rect.

method.name: set_velocity_depth_texture
method.description: Sets the render target of the velocity depth texture.

method.name: set_velocity_target_size
method.description: Sets the target size of the velocity and velocity depth textures.

method.name: set_velocity_texture
method.description: Sets the render target of the velocity texture.

method.name: transform_from_pose
method.description: Creates a [Transform3D] from an [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrPosef.html]XrPosef[/url].

method.name: unregister_composition_layer_provider
method.description: Unregisters the given extension as a composition layer provider. [b]Note:[/b] This cannot be called while the OpenXR session is still running.

method.name: unregister_frame_info_extension
method.description: Unregisters the given extension as modifying frame info. [b]Note:[/b] This cannot be called while the OpenXR session is still running.

method.name: unregister_projection_views_extension
method.description: Unregisters the given extension as a provider of additional data structures to projections views. [b]Note:[/b] This cannot be called while the OpenXR session is still running.

method.name: update_main_swapchain_size
method.description: Request the recommended resolution from the OpenXR runtime and update the main swapchain size if it has changed.

method.name: xr_result
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the provided [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html]XrResult[/url] (cast to an integer) is successful. Otherwise returns [code]false[/code] and prints the [url=https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html]XrResult[/url] converted to a string, with the specified additional information.

constants.constant: Means that [constant XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND] isn't supported at all.
